title: Script-like, rounded, fairly unique.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_3893.jpg)

Very frustrating as I've worked with it before, but can't for the life of me remember the font name!

Any help would be very appreciated!

Font: 

 Riesling 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172026/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-05-09 at 10.54.26 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172026/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-05-09%20at%2010.54.26%20AM.png) | 606.87 KB |
author: JuliaVoo

comments.content:
It looks like **[Riesling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172026/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Riesling%20-%20Regular&fid=fd70966b8c5653bd491c8dcb21ad3149&fsize=60&text=The%20dog%20house&fit=1)** created for Bright Ideas magazine.  
Note that although this font is offered for download by dafont.com there are comments like the following which indicates this is not a free font and you should be extra careful if you want to acquire a legitimate license for a commercial project:

> Bright Ideas Magazine  
> 50USD/month, edited by "Bright Ideas". Bright Ideas is produced under the direction of Creative Director Gail Conwell.  
> These fonts were not free.

You can also use the following similar font:  
 **[Mighty Ditey NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172026/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Nick-Curtis&ffam=Mighty%20Ditey%20NF%20-%20Regular&fid=30f739cdc8b571983a6bc7395eddf7e8&fsize=60&text=The%20dog%20house&fit=1)** by Nick Curtis [2007]
THANK YOU, so much! Thanks for the heads up as well.

As Nick Curtis notes, Mighty Ditey NF is based on a typeface by Richard Nebiolo called Aphrodite for Photo-Lettering Inc. in the early 1970s. Presumably Reisling used the same source. For an interesting view on the license issue for Reisling see [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Riesling?q=riesling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172026/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Riesling?q=riesling "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Riesling?q=riesling")  
Don
